realtime_memories.content: Building portfolio website for Asha Sreenivasan who was recently laid off from HR Assistant/Candidate Experience Specialist role at People Science (remote). Site serves dual purpose: showcase HR/People Operations experience for job search + display South Indian culinary catering business (biryani specialty for 50-100+ guests). Domain: ashasreen.com. Contact: asreeniv3@gmail.com

Next.js 14+ App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Vercel hosting. Uses @phosphor-icons/react for all icons (duotone weight). Dark mode via CSS custom properties + localStorage. Google Fonts: Playfair Display (headings) + Inter (body).

Primary color: coral #f26959 (NOT gold). Warm & professional aesthetic. Mobile-first responsive design. Full dark mode support with theme toggle in header. NEVER use emojis - always use Phosphor icons with duotone weight instead. Never use React Icons or Lucide icons.

Humble, professional job-seeking tone throughout. Emphasize care, organization, follow-through. HR content focuses on candidate experience, coordination, people operations. Culinary content emphasizes traditional South Indian cuisine prepared with intention and attention to detail. Headshot image: /images/headshot-coral.jpeg

YouTube: @ashasculinaryworld (~4,500 subscribers, 1M+ total views). Instagram: @ashasculinaryworld (~1,000 followers). LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/asha-sreenivasan-1a810114b/. Testimonials component on culinary page displays social media comments with platform icons.

Dark mode toggle (fixed: removes 'dark' class when light mode), testimonials carousel with auto-rotation, Phosphor icons replacing all emojis (CoreCompetencies + SpecialtiesSection components), coral theme applied globally, contact form with inquiry type selector (job/catering/general), TESTIMONIALS_GUIDE.md for collecting social media testimonials.
